content: In the SDC minutes (e.g. https://confluence.hl7.org/display/FHIRI/FHIR+SDC+Minutes+CC+20191114), clicking on an issue takes me to a "Permission Denied" page in GForge. I can type the issue into JIRA to see it, but would be it be difficult make those links redirect to JIRA?
Quite - at least until we shut down gForge entirely.
